headline: Reassessing Fox (FOXA) Valuation After Its Strong 12-Month Share Price Rally
summary: Fox (FOXA) has quietly outperformed many media peers this year, with the stock up about 53% over the past year and roughly 23% in the past 3 months, drawing fresh attention to its valuation. See our latest analysis for Fox. With the share price now around $70.3 and a strong 90 day share price return of roughly 23%, momentum looks to be building on top of Fox’s multiyear total shareholder returns. This may suggest that investors are reassessing both its growth prospects and risk profile. If...
